insights.title: PCG (Procedural Content Generation) rising
insights.description: PCG is highlighted in UE 5.4 as a core feature. Consider adding procedural generation content.

insights.title: MetaHumans expanding
insights.description: MetaHuman Animator enables realistic facial capture. High learner interest expected.
